headline: lululemon Q4 Earnings to Reflect Holiday Gains: Buy Now or Wait?
summary: LULU's Q4 results are expected to reflect stronger-than-anticipated holiday demand, driven by favorable customer response to the brand's product offerings.

headline: Trump's tariff plans, inflation data & earnings on tap: 3 Things
summary: US stock futures (ES=F, NQ=F, YM=F) are rising following a Wall Street Journal report that President Trump is narrowing his tariff plans. Investors are also looking to a slew of economic data this week, including the March reading on consumer confidence and February PCE data. It's also a big week for earnings, with GameStop (GME), KB Home (KBH), and Lululemon Athletica (LULU) all reporting quarterly results. Morning Brief Anchors Brad Smith and Madison Mills report on the three things investors need to know Monday morning. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.
